categories: Category:Battles of the Great Sith War

nodes.text: The Battle of Gyndine was a battle of the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, in 3996 BBY. At Gyndine, the two sides fought with the Republic emerging as the victors.
The Battle of Gyndine makes its only appearance in The Essential Atlas. It only illustrates the battle on the galactic map rather than in prose.
